articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Jak umělá inteligence pomáhá s průzkumem Marsu. Při zapamatování a vybavování se mozkové vlny šíří opačným směrem. Průlom ve vývoji ultrarychlých luminiscenčních materiálů. Kvantové tornádo má zlepšit naše chápání černých děr.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Data z CERNu dále omezují podmínky pro dlouho žijící supersymetrické částice

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Energetika a vodárenství zaznamenaly čtyřnásobné zvýšení průměrných nákladů na obnovu po ransomwaru. Technologie baterií (5): Vědci znovu zkusili baterie s vodou jako elektrolytem. Kam se v AddAI posunuli a kam směřují. Ness představuje Matrix, nástroj na efektivní agilní vývoj. Gordic představil nástroj pro signalizaci rizik u podepisovaných elektronických dokumentů.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Energetika a vodárenství zaznamenaly čtyřnásobné zvýšení průměrných nákladů na obnovu po ransomwaru

articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 31/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V Berkley Lab otevřeli cestu k syntéze prvku 120. Stopy života by se mohly dát najít i u povrchu Europy a Enceladu. Pokročilá teorie informace odhaluje příčiny extrémních jevů (nejen) v počasí. Problém posledního parseku ukazuje souvislost mezi supermasivními černými děrami a temnou hmotou.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Pozoroval změnu chování magnetických momentů v antiferomagnetu

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Ať už horečně hledáte levnou cestu k postavení hového počítače, nebo jen chcete upgradovat stárnoucí kopii Office, tato kolekce nabídky od Goodoffer24.com vám pomůže. Jejich ceny jsou opravdu neuvěřitelné, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Získejte ve slevové akci Back to School Windows 10 jen za €20 a Office za €12, Windows 11 za €20

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Studie analyzuje chlazení kapalinami v datových centrech využívaných pro AI. Red Hat zjednodušuje diverzifikaci úloh v hybridním cloudu. Technologie baterií (4): Vědci se pokoušejí o baterie lithium–kov pomocí nanostruktur. Generativní umělou inteligenci si v příštích dvou letech osvojí 85 % vývojářů softwaru. Kyberútoky jsou propojené s nedostatkem dovedností.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Studie analyzuje chlazení kapalinami v datových centrech využívaných pro AI

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nanočástice mají odhalit limity rozsahu kvantového světa. Astronomové potvrdili nejbližší středně těžkou černou díru. Kde se třese Mars? Překonán český rekord ve výdrži ve vzduchu.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Jak chutná a jak voní ve vesmíru

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vyšel nový Endless OS mezi více či méně pravidelnými vydáními distribucí Rescuezilla, Manjaro, Tails, MX Linux, GhostBSD, Alpine Linux, Ultramarine Linux, KaOS, Rhino Linux, NixOS nebo OSMC.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 20-22/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Kdo zaplatí za nejhorší výpadek IT na světě? Téměř polovinu svých pracovních úkolů svěřují zaměstnanci umělé inteligenci. Odvrácená strana agilního vývoje softwaru. Technologie baterií (3): Sodíková baterie s pevným elektrolytem se blíží k praktickému využití. Jak vybrat řešení úložiště pro trénování umělé inteligence. Dvouciferný růst trhu bezpečnostních produktů má pokračovat.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Kdo zaplatí za nejhorší výpadek IT na světě?

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Svobodný citační manažer Zotero (Wikipedie, GitHub) byl vydán v nové major verzi 7. Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu.
articles.title: Zotero 7

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Open source platforma Home Assistant (Demo, GitHub, Wikipedie) pro monitorování a řízení inteligentní domácnosti byla vydána ve verzi 2024.8.
articles.title: Home Assistant 2024.8

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Včera v Las Vegas skončila bezpečnostní konference Black Hat USA 2024 (𝕏) a začala bezpečnostní konference DEF CON 32 (𝕏). V rámci DEF CONu budou vyhlášeny výsledky letošní Pwnie Awards (𝕏, nominace). Pwnie Awards oceňují to nejlepší, ale i to nejhorší z IT bezpečnosti (bezpečnostní Oscar a Malina v jednom).

articles.description:
Roguelite deck builder is pretty far from my favorite genre. I’ve enjoyed some of them, but I wouldn’t actively seek out a new one. Rogue Light Deck Builder, on the other hand…


That’s because Rogue Light Deck Builder is about building a deck. Not a deck of cards, but more like something you’d put furniture on so you can stare at your neighbors. However, there are roguelite elements.


You’re given $1,000,000, a hammer, and a husband. You must construct a deck. The light isn’t very reliable. Your aim with a hammer is deplorable. But the deck must be built.




While Rogue Light Deck Builder is just coming to my attention now and is coming to Steam soon, it’s been out on itch.io for a decent while. It’s $2, and the blurb suggests it will last around 20-30 minutes. I could have probably played this in preparation for this article, but I didn’t. I’ll likely grab it soon, but I like to write like I live my life: uninformed and bewildered.


The grotesque Unreal 5 visual style really appeals to me for some reason. It reminds me of a similar FPS about Presidents fighting weird monsters that I can’t remember the name of. This is why I should write about everything I play, then I’d have a record of it. Instead, I can just clearly remember the game but can’t recall the name. GoblinAmerica! That was it.


Oh, wait. It’s the same guy. The visual style is so evocative because Gil Lawson is the developer behind Rogue Light Deck Builder and GoblinAmerica. I can either consider this a really dumb moment because I didn’t realize it or give myself credit for being able to recognize a shared aesthetic. My brain will probably lean toward the former.


Anyway, you can get Rogue Light Deck Builder on PC via itch.io right now, but it’s coming to Steam soon. Take a peek at the demo for GoblinAmerica, while you’re at it.

The post Rogue Light Deck Builder is not about the kind of deck you’re thinking of appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Rogue Light Deck Builder is not about the kind of deck you’re thinking of

articles.author: Cooper Marshall
articles.description:
An incredibly underrated fighting game, DNF Duel, is currently free-to-own on the Epic Games Store right now. It may not have many players now, but I still think it is worth playing.


It is being offered alongside CYGNI: All Guns Blazing, a visually intriguing shoot 'em up, and the Conduit Free Unlock Bundle for Apex Legends, which grants you the Legend Conduit for free, plus a skin. They are all free-to-own forever, as long as you claim them before August 15 at 4 pm BST / 11 am ET/ 8 am PT.


But why should you play DNF Duel (besides that it's free)? Sit down and let me tell you.


It's actually published by Arc System Works, makers of Guilty Gear, so of course it has an awesome anime art style with a deep fighting system. I enjoy ArcSys games, so I picked it up back when it came out in 2022 and loved the heck out of it.


One of the main mechanics of the game is being able to use simple direction inputs for moves – think Super Smash Bros. However, if you prefer traditional fighting game controls, those are available as well, and will even reward you with more damage. It's an input style that's become more popular in recent years, expanding across a bunch of different fighting games including Street Fighter 6.


We here at Destructoid thought it was an easy-to-learn hard-to-master fighting game, but worried about its longevity. And while its online servers aren’t super populated right now, it still has a niche community and had a community tournament at EVO 2024.


I still highly recommend trying it out if you are a newcomer to fighting games. Maybe just find a Discord or group that plays together, if you are planning on playing online. Plus, if you enjoy it, there are five DLC characters that are also on sale for 50% right now to expand the roster.

The post DNF Duel is free again on the Epic Game Store appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: DNF Duel is free again on the Epic Game Store

EA FC 24 Dodo FUTTIES objective tasks

Assist Machine: Assist 5 goals using players from Brazil in Squad Battles on Min. Semi-Pro difficulty (or Rivals/Champions).


Serie A Goals: Score 6 goals using players from the Serie A in Squad Battles matches on Min. Semi- Pro difficulty (or Rivals/Champions).

Victory Mindset: Win 4 matches in Squad Battles on Min. Semi-Pro difficulty (or Rivals/Champions) while having Min. 3 players from the Serie A in your starting 11.



To get the card quickly, you can play matches in Squad Battles. It's always easier to play against AI-controlled opponents. You can also tune down the difficulty of the matches to make it easier for you to complete all the tasks. 


Dodo's FUTTIES card could have been better in terms of the available playstyles. The absence of Whipped Cross really reduces its ranking on the current meta. Gear up for more Borderlands, as Gearbox CEO Randy Pitchford has said that the company is working on a new entry, alongside a new Brothers in Arms and more. As the Borderlands movie reportedly stinks up theaters, a "new mainline title" has been teased by Pitchford during an Epic Games interview published Thursday. 


When asked if Gearbox is working on the next "mainline" game in the Borderlands series, Pitchford replied: "Of course we are.” 


That's not it, either. While discussing the new Borderlands movie that is available in theatres this weekend, Pitchford teased to Epic Games that multiple projects are in development, thanks to a "leadership cluster," which "drives a project from cradle to grave." 


“With this approach, we’re able to spin up multiple things, including a new Brothers in Arms game, which has been in development for a while—but we’re not yet ready to talk about it," said Pitchford. Perhaps, we could see this project announced during The Game Awards this year. The Brothers in Arms series had a TV show in the works in 2020 as well, and there have been mentions of a new entry in the series over the years.


Duke Nukem is also referenced during the interview. "We’re working on every IP. I mean, we just launched Homeworld 3, and there’s still work going on there," Pitchford said. "And there’s Risk of Rain, and there’s Duke Nukem, and there’s more.”


The latest entry in the Borderlands series was the spinoff Tiny Tina's Wonderlands, which was received relatively well by critics and fans. "Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands is more Borderlands, and the lighter fantasy fare might actually get people to dive in for the first time," said our review. "With that in mind, it’s still more Borderlands, so the same basic formula isn’t going to magically change your stance if you’re a lapsed fan."

The post A new Borderlands is being worked on, says Gearbox CEO appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A new Borderlands is being worked on, says Gearbox CEO

The Mines in Fields of Mistria can seem like an endless network of caverns, but do they have an end? And if so, how far down is it? Well, I’ve gone down as far as I can and discovered everything there is to be found inside the Mines, so let’s look at what I’ve found. 


When you interact with the elevator within the Mines in Mistria, it looks like there should be a total of 100 levels. However, Fields of Mistria has only just been released into Early Access and currently, there are only 60 levels to explore. 


Upon reaching floor 60 of the Mines, you’ll encounter the Priestess again only to be told that you cannot go any further and you must wait. There’s another unnamed Seal on floor 60, just like those on floor 20 and floor 40, although you’re unable to even discover which items you need to find in order to break through it let alone handing them over and getting through the door.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Will more floors be added to the Mines in Fields of Mistria?


According to the Early Access roadmap released by RPG Studios, there will indeed be new biomes coming to the Mines, although it’s not clear when this will happen. 


The new biomes aren’t coming as part of the first major planned update, which is expected to arrive at some point before 2024 is over, but it is detailed in the ‘future updates’ section of the roadmap. 


Image via NPC Studios


If I were to guess, judging from the floor 60 Seal room, I expect the floors post this latest seal to be filled with Gold and volcanic resources just begging to be used in our crafting endeavors. 


Until we can get through the door, though, the Mines are still worth diving into whenever you’re at a loss for what to do. Not only are there valuable resources inside, but you’ll also need to keep going inside to increase both your Mining and Combat levels to unlock new perks.
